name: Platinum Golem
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Divine Custodian
entries: When the golem hits a creature with an {@action opportunity attack}, that creature's speed becomes 0 for the rest of the turn.

traits.name: Immutable Form
entries: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The golem has {@quickref Advantage and Disadvantage|PHB|2|0|advantage} on {@quickref saving throws|PHB|2|1} against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The golem makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Slam
entries: Melee atk +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 19 (3d8 + 6 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Mace
entries: Melee atk +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 22 (3d10 + 6 damage) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Radiant Blast {@recharge}
entries: The golem emits a burst of radiant light in a 20-foot radius. Each creature in the area must make a DC 18 Constitution {@quickref saving throws|PHB|2|1|saving throw}. On a failed save, a creature takes 18 (4d8 damage) radiant damage and is {@condition blinded} until the end of its next turn. On a success, the creature takes half as much damage and is not {@condition blinded}.

immune: bludgeoning (from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine)
piercing (from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine)
slashing (from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine)
